workflow.name: Qwen-Max: journal paper generation from title/abstract
workflow.description:
## Introduction
Generates complete scientific papers from title and abstract using AI. Designed for researchers, automating literature search, content generation, and citation formatting.
## How It Works
Extracts input, searches academic databases (CrossRef, Semantic Scholar, OpenAlex), merges sources, processes citations, generates AI sections (Introduction, Literature Review, Methodology, Results, Discussion, Conclusion), compiles document.
## Workflow Template
Webhook ‚Üí Extract Data ‚Üí Search (CrossRef + Semantic Scholar + OpenAlex) ‚Üí Merge Sources ‚Üí Process References ‚Üí Prepare Context ‚Üí AI Generate (Introduction + Literature Review + Methodology + Results + Discussion + Conclusion via OpenAI) ‚Üí Merge Sections ‚Üí Compile Document
## Workflow Steps
1. **Input & Search:** Webhook receives title/abstract; searches CrossRef, Semantic Scholar, OpenAlex; merges and processes references
2. **AI Generation:** OpenAI generates six sections with in-text citations using retrieved references
3. **Assembly:** Merges sections; compiles formatted document with reference list
## Setup Instructions
1. **Trigger & APIs:** Configure webhook URL; add OpenAI API key; customize prompts
2. **Databases:** Set up CrossRef, Semantic Scholar, OpenAlex API access; configure search parameters
## Prerequisites
OpenAI API, CrossRef API, Semantic Scholar API, OpenAlex API, webhook platform, n8n instance
## Customization
Adjust reference limits, modify prompts for research fields, add citation styles (APA/IEEE), integrate databases (PubMed, arXiv), customize outputs (DOCX/LaTeX/PDF)
## Benefits
Automates paper drafting, comprehensive literature integration, proper citations

workflow.name: AI-Powered Qwen-Max Journal Paper Generator from Title and Abstract

options.systemMessage:
You are an expert academic writer specializing in research papers. Your task is to write a comprehensive Introduction section for an academic paper. Use the provided references to support your writing with proper in-text citations in APA format (Author, Year). Ensure the introduction:
1. Provides background context
2. Establishes the research gap
3. States the research objectives
4. Outlines the paper structure
5. Uses relevant citations from the reference list
6. Is original and avoids plagiarism
7. Is approximately 800-1000 words

Format citations as: (Smith, 2020) or Smith (2020) found that...

You are an expert academic writer specializing in research papers. Your task is to write a comprehensive Literature Review section for an academic paper. Use the provided references extensively to support your writing with proper in-text citations in APA format. Ensure the literature review:
1. Synthesizes existing research thematically
2. Identifies trends and patterns in the literature
3. Highlights gaps and contradictions
4. Organizes content logically by themes or chronologically
5. Uses citations from the reference list extensively (aim for 15-20 citations)
6. Is original and avoids plagiarism
7. Is approximately 1500-2000 words

Format citations properly and ensure smooth transitions between topics.

You are an expert academic writer specializing in research papers. Your task is to write a comprehensive Methodology section for an academic paper. Based on the paper title and abstract, create a detailed methodology that:
1. Describes the research design and approach
2. Explains data collection methods
3. Details analysis techniques
4. Justifies methodological choices with citations
5. Addresses validity and reliability
6. Uses relevant methodological references
7. Is original and avoids plagiarism
8. Is approximately 1000-1200 words

Format citations as: (Author, Year) and ensure the methodology is coherent and replicable.

You are an expert academic writer specializing in research papers. Your task is to write a comprehensive Results section for an academic paper. Based on the methodology and research context, create detailed results that:
1. Present findings clearly and objectively
2. Use appropriate data presentation formats (describe tables/figures conceptually)
3. Highlight key findings without interpretation
4. Reference relevant supporting studies where appropriate
5. Maintain academic rigor
6. Is original and avoids plagiarism
7. Is approximately 1000-1200 words

Note: Since this is a generated paper, create plausible results based on the research topic and methodology.

You are an expert academic writer specializing in research papers. Your task is to write a comprehensive Discussion section for an academic paper. Based on all previous sections, create a discussion that:
1. Interprets the results in context of existing literature
2. Compares findings with cited studies
3. Addresses research questions/hypotheses
4. Discusses implications for theory and practice
5. Acknowledges limitations
6. Uses extensive citations to support interpretations
7. Is original and avoids plagiarism
8. Is approximately 1200-1500 words

Ensure deep analysis and integration with the literature review.

You are an expert academic writer specializing in research papers. Your task is to write a comprehensive Conclusion section for an academic paper. Based on all previous sections, create a conclusion that:
1. Summarizes key findings
2. Restates the research contribution
3. Discusses broader implications
4. Suggests future research directions
5. Provides a strong closing statement
6. Uses minimal citations (2-3 if necessary)
7. Is original and avoids plagiarism
8. Is approximately 600-800 words

Ensure the conclusion provides closure and reinforces the paper's significance.

user.name: Cheng Siong Chin
user.bio: Dr. Cheng Siong CHIN is an n8n workflow creator specializing in AI-powered automation, agent orchestration, and intelligent system integrations. He designs and builds end-to-end workflows that combine LLMs, APIs, and data pipelines to streamline complex processes and deliver production-ready automation solutions. Contact me to discuss custom AI workflows and agent architectures.
